testmod-GiftDamagedPower.NAME: Christmas Gift - Damaged
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yStatus, #yExhaust it and add #b
random #yChristmas #yGift into your hand. #yChristmas #yGift cost #b0 and #Exhaust on use.

testmod-GiftExplosionPower.NAME: Christmas Gift - Explosion
DESCRIPTIONS: of tier #b3 #yBomb. NL Next affect in #b

testmod-GiftInfinitePower.NAME: Christmas Gift - Infinite
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of each turn add #b

testmod-christmas-PlaguePower.NAME: Disaster - Plague
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive an #Attack damage, make all enemies' #yPoison affects #b

testmod-WarPower.NAME: Disaster - War
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply an AOE damage, repeat the damage #b
